references.paper_title: A stochastic view of optimal regret through minimax duality
references.reason: This paper establishes a fundamental result on the minimax optimal static regret, which is a foundational concept for understanding switching regret.

references.paper_title: Problem complexity and method efficiency in optimization
references.reason: This review provides important context for the complexity and efficiency of online convex optimization algorithms.
This paper introduces the concept of strongly adaptive algorithms, which are relevant to the adaptive nature of the algorithm proposed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: A decision-theoretic generalization of on-line learning and an application to boosting
references.reason: This paper introduces the Hedge algorithm, which serves as an important example of a base algorithm for the RESET algorithm discussed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Online convex programming and generalized infinitesimal gradient ascent
references.reason: This paper introduces online gradient descent, which is used as a base algorithm in the RESET algorithm, and provides the foundation for understanding its dynamic regret bounds.
